alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Dodge; Emanuel; Johnson; Laurens; Treutlen; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 5:30AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Laurens, southeastern Wilkinson, northwestern Emanuel, northwestern Dodge, western Treutlen, southeastern Bleckley, south central Washington and Johnson Counties through 600 AM EDT... At 530 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Tuckers Crossroad to near Harlow to Dubois, and moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dublin, Soperton, Wrightsville, East Dublin, Chester, Adrian, Dexter, Dudley, Cadwell, Rentz, Kite, Dubois, Spann, Lothair, Plainfield, Empire, Rockledge, Roddy, Baileys Park and Rowland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Bleckley; Dodge; Emanuel; Johnson; Laurens; Treutlen; Washington; Wilkinson
